issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: TimelineWebServices.getEntity should throw ForbiddenException instead of 404 when ACL checks fail

comments.body: Attached patch which throws  a ForbiddenException when ACL checks fail instead of 404
Removed logging of domainId for getEntity calls since it is not not passed in the call params. Thanks [~vinodkv] for the review.

Thanks [~suma.shivaprasad] 

Overall patch looks fine. Few minor nits

1.  {{throw new YarnException (callerUGI, }} Instead of printing callerUGI, its better to print callerUGI.getShortUserName(). Other wise it will be verbose.

2. Could we add a test for this?
Thanks [~sunilg] Addressed review comments. There is an existing test "TestTimelineWebServices.testGetEntityWithYarnACLsEnabled" which covers this case. Please let me know if anything else if needed.

Thanks [~suma.shivaprasad]. Patch looks fine.

Pending jenkins.
